name: ClinkClink Tag Game
description:
ClinkClink Tag Game
"ClinkClink Tag Game" is a game where you have to run away from enemies and win all the medals on the stage. As you progress through the game, meet different "CUBEs."

Earn medals!
Control the "CUBE ZERO" to earn medals on stage! If you get caught by an enemy, you will be much closer to game over. Run away from your enemies and earn medals!

Lots of "CUBEs"
The ClinkClink Tag Game features a lot of "CUBEs". Progress through the game and meet lots of CUBEs!

New Content "Tower of God"
In the future, we plan to implement the new content "Tower of God" in the update. Please look forward to it!
